summary: Most performance-focused requirements appear addressed: non-home pages are converted to React.lazy imports in App.tsx, a shared RouteLoadingFallback component was added, the chat widget is deferred via an AsyncChatAssistantWidget wrapper, the HomePage hero image now has explicit dimensions/aspect ratio and async decoding, and React Query defaults plus maintenance/admin query caching were tuned. However, the diff also includes several unrelated UI/content/admin enhancements not requested by the performance brief.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded glossary admin backup/restore UI and snapshot parsing/validation behavior (product/admin functionality not requested as part of performance optimization).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly exclude new product features unrelated to performance; glossary backup/restore changes are not mentioned in REQ-1..REQ-5.

hallucinated_features.description: Header navigation restructuring and addition of prominent Feedback entry points (desktop + mobile) using shared openFeedbackForm utility.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; constitutes UI/navigation feature work outside performance scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer navigation/link changes including a new Feedback link under Company section and dynamic branding/layout changes beyond query-caching/ticker performance tuning.
hallucinated_features.reason: Only ticker/query caching behavior is within REQ-5; additional navigation/link features are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple page-level content/feature enhancements (e.g., LearningPage URL topic selection/auto-scroll, ArticlesPage tabbed categories UI, RegulationsPage SEBI disclaimer/tabbed content, AboutPage new 'live market integration feature' content).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals disallow adding new content/pages/features unrelated to performance; these appear to be feature/content changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Contact page functional/content change: message submission form behavior and removal of embedded Google Form feedback card.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1..REQ-5; constitutes product/UI change.

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling/theme typography changes applying font-body to body and font-heading to headings.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the performance requirements; could be visual redesign work unrelated to code-splitting/deferred loading/query caching.

hallucinated_features.description: Glossary page additions: admin diagnostic panel showing backend vs rendered counts with mismatch detection.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of performance requirements; adds admin diagnostics functionality.
